procedural_fairness: post-judgment amendments to pleadings are generally disallowed
decision_reasoning: these issues were procedural errors, not clerical oversights, and thus fell outside Rule 397's scope
cause_of_action: Defendants sought reconsideration of a patent invalidity counterclaim, claiming oversight and pleading errors
procedure_followed: Defendants moved for reconsideration after final judgment, citing overlooked issues and pleading amendments. The judge analyzed functus officio and relevant rules
